title: The YouTuber who built a career from true crime and make-up
description: Bailey Sarian dabbled in YouTube for years before a chance idea led to a new profession.

title: Whisky makers are turning their backs on peat
description: Burning peat has long been a way of adding flavour to whisky but some are now rejected that process.

title: China ride-hailing giant Didi fined $1.2bn after probe
description: The country's cyber security watchdog launched a probe into the firm just days after its US listing.

title: Elon Musk's Tesla sells most of its Bitcoin holdings
description: The announcement comes as the value of the world's biggest cryptocurrency has plunged.
